PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-09472011-09-22,  ,  ND,  TB,  , 
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectBorrowing of Defence Materials and Equipment Order
PrecisBORROWING OF DEFENCE MATERIALS AND EQUIPMENT ORDER REVOCATION in order to revoke the $50,000 limit and allow the Minister of National Defence to borrow equipment at higher values without seeking Governor in Council approval in each case.
AttachmentsAttachment
